text: ۞وَقَيَّضۡنَا لَهُمۡ قُرَنَآءَ فَزَيَّنُواْ لَهُم مَّا بَيۡنَ أَيۡدِيهِمۡ وَمَا خَلۡفَهُمۡ وَحَقَّ عَلَيۡهِمُ ٱلۡقَوۡلُ فِيٓ أُمَمٖ قَدۡ خَلَتۡ مِن قَبۡلِهِم مِّنَ ٱلۡجِنِّ وَٱلۡإِنسِۖ إِنَّهُمۡ كَانُواْ خَٰسِرِينَ

translation.en: And We appointed for them companions who made attractive to them what was before them and what was behind them [of sin], and the word has come into effect upon them among nations which had passed on before them of jinn and men. Indeed, they [all] were losers
translation.id: Dan Kami tetapkan bagi mereka teman-teman (setan) yang memuji-muji apa saja yang ada di hadapan dan di belakang mereka775) dan tetaplah atas mereka putusan azab bersama umat-umat yang terdahulu sebelum mereka dari (golongan) jin dan manusia. Sungguh, mereka adalah orang-orang yang rugi
